# Roaming Sonic - Travel and Tour Management System

## Project Status
- [x] Project structure created
- [x] Backend setup completed
- [x] User models created
- [x] Authentication implemented
- [x] Frontend setup completed
- [x] Login/Registration pages created
- [x] Homepage created
- [x] Dependencies installed
- [x] Backend server running (Port 5000)
- [x] Frontend server running (Port 3000)
- [x] Database connected (MongoDB)

## Tech Stack
- MongoDB, Express, React, Node.js (MERN)
- MVC Architecture
- JWT Authentication
- Bangladesh-specific travel management

## Active Servers
- Backend API: http://localhost:5000
- Frontend App: http://localhost:3000
- Database: MongoDB (roaming-sonic)

## User Roles
1. Tourist - Book tickets, hotels, tours
2. Hotel Owner - Manage properties
3. Guide - Offer tour services
4. Admin - Manage entire system
